text: East Union is an unincorporated community in Wayne County, in the U.S. state of Ohio. ==History== The community is located within East Union Township, which was named after Union, Maine. A post office called East Union was established in 1831, and remained in operation until 1907. Besides the post office, East Union had a country store. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Wayne County, Ohio Category:Unincorporated communities in Ohio
title: East Union, Wayne County, Ohio
